channel.title: Need help with bones on altar
channel.description:
When i use any type of bones on the altar a screen pops up saying 'Sacrifice Bones' and 'Sacrifice All Bones' but when i click it nothing happens, this is how it looks:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/807/bones.png/][IMG]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/135/bones.png[/img][/URL]
Anyone know how to fix this? Or if you don't know how to fix this can you tell me how to make it so that when i normally bury a bone the xp is changed?

item.title: Need help with bones on altar
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Add an dialogue action for those.

Read full topic

@Mr.czar wrote:
